title: Client wont open
body: Hey guys recently i've been having problems with league client. When i try to open it the badge shows up but nothing after that. I have tried searching online and changed the compatibility settings but so far none of em have helped. Please let me know if you have a solution. My OS is Windows 8.1

replies.body:
The only setting inside the capability area that may work is running the game as admin. This is because League requires a lot of specific privileges in order to run correctly, so working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) is a good next step.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.

I have been running client as administrator. So somehow finally the badge did go and the client appeared and it started updating. But, after a bit it said "UPDATE FAILED. UNSPECIFIED ERROR OCCURRED. PLEASE CHECK LOGS FOR MORE DETAILS"

Ah, so this likely happened after 32%. At this point, the patcher is attempting to pull files from the patching servers, and an error here usually means there's an issue maintaining a strong connection. Working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) would be my suggestion, as local network settings often cause these types of issues to occur.

Let me know if those steps helped.
